newsitem.title: UK: RESEARCH ALERT-Zurich Insurance rated buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Zurich Insurance rated buy.

text.p: Zurich Insurance Co was rated "buy" as analysts at Salomon Brothers began coverage of the stock, a research note from analyst Andrew Pitt at the brokerage said on Monday.
The note said Zurich has one of the world's premier insurance franchises and is "conceptually far advanced in terms of efficient capital allocation and customer segmentation."

It also has one of the strongest balance sheets compared with international rivals while a 17 percent premium to an adjusted current net asset value of 305 Swiss francs per share is low in relation to forecast returns on equity, the note said.
The note set a target price of 410 Swiss francs for the shares, which were up two Swiss francs at 359 by 1326 GMT.
